DataElement.preferredName: Submission Institution Specimen Blocks Return Request Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date the preserved specimens, embedded in support material submitted for research purposes, was returned to the submitting institution.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Submission Institution Specimen Blocks Return Request
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the request by the submitting institution to have the preserved specimens embedded in support material submitted for research purposes to be returned.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Submission; a message submitted for the judgment of others.:An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research as, a literary institution; also, a building or the buildings occupied or used by such organization.

Concepts.definition: Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.

Property.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Blocks; refers to preserved specimens embedded in support material.:To give something back, or the getting back thereof.:Express the need or desire for; ask for.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
Refers to preserved specimens embedded in support material.  These are typically cut into thin slices for microscopic examination, with or without an enhancement such as staining.
To give something back, or the getting back thereof.
Express the need or desire for; ask for.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
